name: bienestar
description: Aplicaci√≥n para ofertar los servicios de Bienestar al Aprendiz

scripts.migrate-seed: npm run migrate && npm run seed
scripts.undo:all: sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --config config/sequelize.js && sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --config config/sequelize.js
scripts.migrate-seed:dev: npm run migrate:dev && npm run seed:dev
scripts.undo:all:dev: sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --config config/sequelize.js && sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --config config/sequelize.js && npm run clean:uploads:dev

author: Jeimy Pinto
